message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer for this product?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $10000. I'm willing to consider a price of $12500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not sure I can meet you at $11000. I'm willing to consider a price of $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
